notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: G.S., R.L., S.P. and A.C. conceived and designed the experiments. S.P., P.C., R.I. and G.M. synthesized the compounds. G.S., B.K., S.M. and B.B. performed virus-related experiments. All authors analyzed data and contributed new reagents analytic tools. G.S., R.L., S.P., and A.C. wrote the paper. All authors reviewed and approved the manuscript.
